sentences.en: A brand was a mark of ownership burned into the hide of an animal with a hot iron.
sentences.cn: 烙印是用烙铁烧在牲畜皮上的所有权标记。

sentences.en: Advertising agencies are losing their once-powerful grip on brand marketing.
sentences.cn: 广告代理公司正逐渐丧失曾经对品牌营销的有力控制。

sentences.en: As the day wore on Brand found himself increasingly impressed.
sentences.cn: 白天慢慢过去，布兰德发现自己兴趣愈发浓厚。

sentences.en: Brand's keen ear caught the trace of an accent.
sentences.cn: 布兰德敏锐的耳朵听出了口音。

sentences.en: But that doesn't mean this brand of politics is dead or dying.
sentences.cn: 但那并不意味着这种政治主张已经或正在消亡。

sentences.en: Despite his weariness, Brand mustered a wan smile.
sentences.cn: 虽然精疲力竭，布兰德还是无力地笑了笑。

sentences.en: Drugs can be sold under different brand names throughout the EU.
sentences.cn: 药品可以用不同的商标在欧盟各国出售。

sentences.en: Each cow was branded with the ranch’s logo.
sentences.cn: 每头母牛都烙上了该牧场的标记。

sentences.en: Far more boats are bought second-hand than are bought brand new.
sentences.cn: 买二手船的人要远比买新船的多。

sentences.en: His waterproof trousers were brand new and stiff.
sentences.cn: 他那条防水裤崭新笔挺。

sentences.en: In office supplies, we're the brand leader.
sentences.cn: 我们的产品是办公用品的领导品牌。

sentences.en: It would be uneconomical to send a brand new tape.
sentences.cn: 寄一盘新磁带过去不合算。

sentences.en: Our favourite by a long way was the supermarkets' own brand.
sentences.cn: 我们的最爱绝对是超市的自产品牌。

sentences.en: products which lack a strong brand image
sentences.cn: 缺乏鲜明品牌形象的产品

sentences.en: That brand of humour generally travels well.
sentences.cn: 那种风格的幽默通常在各地都喜闻乐见。

sentences.en: The owner couldn't be bothered to brand the cattle.
sentences.cn: 主人懒得给这牛打上烙印。

sentences.en: There's something charminglyold-fashioned about his brand of entertainment.
sentences.cn: 他自成一格的表演有一种迷人的旧情调。

sentences.en: Which brand of toothpaste do you use?
sentences.cn: 你用什么牌子的牙膏？

sentences.en: Winston is a brand of cigarette.
sentences.cn: 云斯顿是一种香烟品牌。

sentences.en: Yesterday he went off to buy himself a brand-new car.
sentences.cn: 昨天他去给自己买了一辆崭新的小汽车。

words.tran_cn: 名牌商标的；打有烙印的；有斑纹的（等于brindled）
铭刻（brand的过去式和过去分词）
在…上加商标；使显得独一无二（brand的现在分词）
铭刻于，铭记；打烙印于；印…商标于

phrases.tran_cn: 品牌意识，商标意识；品牌知名度
品牌识别；品牌标识；品牌同一性
全国性品牌；国家名牌；全国性商标
自有品牌；使用自己商标的商品

trans.tran_en: a type of product made by a particular company, that has a particular name or design

trans.tran_cn: 加污名于，丑化，谴责，在…打烙印
trans.tran_en: When you brand an animal, you put a permanent mark on its skin in order to show who it belongs to, usually by burning a mark onto its skin

trans.tran_cn: 铭刻于， 打烙印于， 以烙铁打； 加污名于， 谴责
trans.tran_en: When you brand an animal, you put a permanent mark on its skin in order to show who it belongs to, usually by burning a mark onto its skin
